molecular.geometry.cross¶

molecular.geometry.cross(a, b)[source]¶

Compute cross product between vectors a and b. Points to numpy.cross()

Parameters

  • a (ArrayLike) – Vectors

  • b (ArrayLike) – Vectors

Returns

Cross product of u and v

Return type

float or numpy.ndarray

Next topic
